WorkItem.Description:
Morphing is an image processing technique to progressively transition from one graphical object into another. This visual technique can be use to create animations where one object(image) gets transformed into another over a period of time or transform the image of one person into another personâ€™s image.

The application  must use to generate morphing between images of faces of different people as well as between different images of the face of an individual.
WorkItem.Summary: A Sample Image Morphing Application in C#
